original_title: Trilogy of Ballet: Romeo and Juliet
overview: Shakespeare's tragic romance is reinterpreted for the stage in this sweeping ballet starring Bolshoi Ballet legends Natalya Bessmertnova and Mikhail Mikhail Lavrovsky, accompanied by Vladimir Levaschev and Yuri Papki. Features music by Sergei Prokofiev; Mary Tyler Moore hosts this 1976 TV production.
title: Trilogy of Ballet: Romeo and Juliet
